item.title: Social Media Content Creator for B2B Engineering Company (LinkedIn & Facebook) - Upwork
item.description:
We are a dynamic and innovative general and heavy engineering company seeking a talented Social Media Content Creator to elevate our online presence. Your primary role will be to plan, create, and schedule engaging content for our LinkedIn and Facebook pages. We aim to set the industry on fire with our social media presence, showcasing our current jobs and promoting our services through static posts, videos, and reels.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and implement a content strategy for LinkedIn and Facebook.
- Create and schedule high-quality, engaging posts twice a week, with plans to increase to daily postings.
- Produce a mix of professional, technical, and humorous content tailored to our target audience.
- Highlight current projects, showcase our services, and promote our brand through various content formats, including static images, videos, and reels.
- Stay updated with industry trends and incorporate them into our social media strategy.
- Collaborate with our team to ensure the content aligns with our company values and objectives.

Skills Required:
- Proven experience in social media content creation and scheduling.
- Strong understanding of LinkedIn and Facebook platforms and their best practices.
- Excellent writing and editing skills, with the ability to create engaging and compelling content.
- Proficiency in creating and editing videos and graphics.
- Creative thinking and the ability to generate innovative content ideas.
- Understanding of B2B marketing, especially in the engineering and mechanical plant installation sectors.
- Knowledge of analytics and the ability to develop KPIs and metrics over time.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience in the engineering, construction, or industrial sectors.
- Familiarity with content creation tools and software (e.g., Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, video editing tools).
- Strong portfolio demonstrating a range of content types and successful social media campaigns.

Hourly Range: $8.00-$40.00

item.title: Video Producer for engaging Kickstarter & product introduction video for card game - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a talented and experienced video producer to create a compelling 1.5-minute video that introduces our exciting new card game, American Pursuit, for its Kickstarter launch. This video will be instrumental in generating buzz and attracting backers. Next to that the video should be adapted for later use as a general product introduction video as well.

About American Pursuit:
Life, liberty, and the pursuit of laughter—preferably at your rivals’ expense! American Pursuit is a fast-paced, strategic card game where you chase your dreams in a slapdash race to the finish. Confound your rivals with cunning action cards, all while amassing cash and popularity to collect the most dreams!

Your Role:
- You take the lead in video production process, take the concept, tell me which shots etc are needed and you do editing and final delivery. I encourage creative input and collaboration – I am looking for someone who can bring their expertise to the table and help us tell the story of American Pursuit in the most engaging way possible.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with me to develop a captivating video that effectively introduces the game and its key features.
- Share which assets you'd need (footage, images etc) so I can source those by e.g. working with UGC content creators (e.g. people playing the game)
- Scriptwriting (optional): Creating a engaging script that complements the visuals.
- Editing the video into a polished and dynamic final product, incorporating sound design and music.
- Revisions: Working with us to make adjustments based on feedback.

Desired Skills & Experience:
- Proven experience creating engaging and effective video content for Kickstarter campaigns.
- A strong portfolio showcasing previous work, specifically with card or board game videos (a plus).
- Creative vision and the ability to translate ideas into compelling visuals.
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).

Bonus Points:
- Understanding of Kickstarter campaign video best practices.

Thank you!

Budget: $300

item.title: Seeking Talented Video Editor for Various Creative Projects - Upwork
item.description:
I am a portrait photographer looking to expand into video creation, and I’m in need of a skilled video editor to bring my footage to life. My goal is to create high-quality, engaging videos with a modern and cinematic touch. Here’s what I’m looking for:

Responsibilities:

• Work with minimal direction, able to create a narrative or flow from the provided footage.
• Arrange clips in a logical and engaging order, ensuring smooth transitions and stabilizing shaky footage.
• Flexibly incorporate any feedback or adjustments needed.
• Develop a unique and modern style for various types of videos including recap/lifestyle videos, wedding videos, blog-type videos, and Instagram reels.

Requirements:

• Proven experience in video editing with a portfolio of past work.
• Ability to naturally create a seamless flow in video narratives.
• Strong eye for detail and aesthetics.
• Ability to stabilize shaky footage and smooth out transitions.
• Open to curating and defining a specific style and aesthetic that stands out.

Preferred Qualifications:

• Experience with cinematic editing and creating high-quality visuals.
• Familiarity with different types of video formats and social media platforms.
